boilerplate.containers.HomePage.startInt: In this video interview, you would be given {readingTimeLimit} secs to read each question. When the countdown timer reaches "0", the system will automatically begin recording your response. And you'll be given a maximum of {answerTimeLimit} minutes per question to complete your response. Please note that it will be a one-time through recording, You won't be able to record twice a response for the same question.
You could try a Practice Interview before begining the real one.
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.question: In the next page, you will be given {readingTimeLimit} seconds to read each question before your recording begins automatically.
There will be {numQuestions} questions to complete this interview and you are given {answerTimeLimit} minutes per question.
When you are ready, please click "Next".
In the next page, you will be given {readingTimeLimit} seconds to read the Practice Interview Question before your recording begins automatically.
There will be {numQuestions} questions to complete this practice interview and you are given {answerTimeLimit} minutes per question.
When you are ready, please click on the "Next" button.
Submission Deadline: {deadline}
Not Applicable
Next
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.Record.U: Please keep this page open while we are uploading your video.
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.Record.C: Please make sure your camera and microphone are working properly before starting the test.
Click on "Start recording" to start testing.
You can review your recorded video by clicking on the  "Review" button.
Or starting the interview by clicking on the "Start" button.
Once you are ready, you can click on the "Start" button.
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.Finish.P: You have finished the practice interview.
You can now start the real interview.
Once you are ready, click on "Begin Interview"
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.Error.de: There seems to be some error in the background uploading of your videos.
Please check your Internet Connection and contact to admin@system.com to get new test.
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.Error.Ch: Your camera and microphone seem not to work. Please check!
If you are sure your devices work well. Please also check if you blocked them on your browser.
Please make sure you allow your camera and microphone to work on your browser, follow below instruction image then try again:
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.Error.Un: Unsupported Browser! Please try again on another browser.
